define [
  'oraculum'
  'oraculum/libs'
], (Oraculum) ->
  'use strict'

  Backbone = Oraculum.get 'Backbone'

¶ Evented.Mixin

By making Backbone's Events mixin a proper mixin, we don't have to rely on any object in the system to have previously implemented Backbone's eventing interface implicitly. We can instead require it explicitly and ensure that any mixin that relies on eventing behaviors has those behaviors available using FactoryJS's mixin dependency chaining.

 

  Oraculum.defineMixin 'Evented.Mixin', Backbone.Events
